field.name: summary
field.value: Runtime error when session state switched off

field.name: description
field.value:
I create a controller and set the ControllerDetails.Stateless property to true. All behaves as it should. I then switch off session in my web.config (using <sessionState mode="Off"/>) and get a consistent runtime error in the HttpHandler for the index view. This is probably occurring because engineContext.Session is null. I guess that wherever Session is used throughout the framework there needs to be a check either for null or for Stateless=true.
